definitions.definition: To feel sorry about (a thing that has or has not happened), afterthink : to wish that a thing had not happened , that something else had happened instead.

examples: I regret that I have to do this, but I don't have a choice.

definitions.definition: To miss ; to feel the loss or absence of; to mourn.

main_definition: To feel sorry about (a thing that has or has not happened), afterthink : to wish that a thing had not happened , that something else had happened instead.
secondary_definitions: ( more generally ) To feel sorry about (any thing).
( archaic , transitive ) To miss ; to feel the loss or absence of; to mourn.
